V5.description: Modern React + TypeScript implementation of BingoBoard with enhanced features and architecture.

changes.details: Supports dual architecture with V4 (Legacy) and V5 (Modern) implementations.
Comprehensive session tracking and analytics for real-time multiplayer functionality, inspired by the V4 stats view.
Advanced pattern generation with rotation, filtering, and caching for performance. Now includes support for game pattern variants.
React components with CSS Modules, TypeScript interfaces, and custom hooks.

Complete redesign of the user interface with descriptions for each page: Home Page (Entry point with navigation options), Game Board (Interactive bingo board for gameplay), Settings Page (Configuration options for game preferences), Telemetry View (Real-time analytics and session tracking), Select Game Page (Choose game patterns and configurations).
New page providing detailed information about the application and its features.
Seamless migration tools and compatibility for transitioning from V4 to V5.
